detail_desc: Trousers in woven fabric with beaded embroidery. Regular waist, a concealed zip in one side and tapered legs. Lined.
Rugby shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a woven collar and button placket. Long sleeves with buttoned, woven cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Cargo shorts in cotton twill with worn details, a button fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and flap leg pockets with a press-stud.
Cargo shorts in cotton twill with worn details, a button fly, side pockets, flap back pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and flap leg pockets with a press-stud.
Jersey top with a draped neckline and double shoulder straps of ball chain that cross at the back.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the waist and flare to the hem with a gathered flounce. Unlined.
Soft lace blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Jersey lining.
Soft lace blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Jersey lining.
Soft lace blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length trousers in a lightweight weave with concealed front pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs with a seam and decorative gathers at the knees. Lacing detail at the hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with an extended waistband and concealed button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, zip fly and concealed hooks and eyes. Straight legs in a slightly looser fit with seams at the knees.
Aviator-style glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs.

Lace body with integral push-up bra. The bra is non-wired with moulded, padded, triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with a cut-out section. High cut at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
Coat in imitation suede with a faux fur lining, raw edges, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and tapered legs.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with shaped cups and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with a functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem.
Cotton jersey top with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Cotton jersey top with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shortie briefs in stretch fabric with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back with low-cut legs. Seamless.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short cap sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and scalloped trims, buttons at the back and a scalloped hem.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short cap sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and scalloped trims, buttons at the back and a scalloped hem.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.

Bustier in a cotton weave with a bow on the front, grosgrain shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Loose-fit trousers in stretch twill with a detachable tie belt, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a double-layered hood with a wrapover front.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a double-layered hood with a wrapover front.
Super push-up lace bralette with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, dropped shoulders, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Reverse-stitched, striped T-shirt in printed slub jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and a contrasting colour neckline. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.

V-neck, cold shoulder blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue back around the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem.

V-neck, cold shoulder blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue back around the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short-sleeved, rounded poncho in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood and kangaroo pocket.
Wrap dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed press-stud at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Wrap dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed press-stud at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in satin with a collar, buttons at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and short, butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in satin with a collar, buttons at the top, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and short, butterfly sleeves. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a visible press-stud at the waist, fake fly and sewn-in creases.
